s.text: All three apportion a great deal of guilt to my father, who did not win custody of them when they were younger.
It is admirable that you regard responsibility in a different way than the three boys you write about.

This is going back a bit, but I was struck by the letter from . As a psychology professor, a previous psych major, and an avocational singer, I agree with your advice to "Go for it" but think there's yet another option that Carpe should consider before running away from home or from college.

This is going back a bit, but I was struck by the letter from . As a psychology professor, a previous psych major, and an avocational singer, I agree with your advice to "Go for it" but think there's yet another option that Carpe should consider before running away from home or from college.

This is going back a bit, but I was struck by the letter from . As a psychology professor, a previous psych major, and an avocational singer, I agree with your advice to "Go for it" but think there's yet another option that Carpe should consider before running away from home or from college.
What you suggest is very sound advice, and Prudie thanks you for being a Prudie.
How would you recommend I deal with this?
Prudie recommends, by the way, that you not bring up this subject with your brothers.
My wife of eight years is starting to make me wonder if she is mature enough to even be married.
My wife of eight years is starting to make me wonder if she is mature enough to even be married.
I am 25, and my stepbrothers are in their late 30s.
